title: Add session management and logout functionality
description: Implement session management using localStorage or cookies to persist login state. Add logout functionality that clears session and redirects to login page.

title: Create hello world page with red text
description: Build a hello world page that displays 'Hello World' text in red color. Include a logout button to return to the login page.

title: Create login page
description: Build a login page with username and password fields. Implement basic client-side validation and redirect to hello world page on successful login.

title: Set up basic web app project structure
description: Initialize project with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript files. Set up a simple server or static file structure to serve the application.

title: Simple Web App with Login and Hello World
description: A simple web application with a login page that redirects to a hello world page displaying text in red
